value.name: UPDATE: Suspect in Horrific Pittsburg Double-Fatal Crash on Probation For Prior DUI
value.description: Police say 25-year-old Christian Vargas, driving a black Chevy Camaro around 6 pm Monday, crashed into the Corrina Rosalez family’s white Corolla, killing the father of 3 young children ...

value.name: Convicted DUI driver charged in deadly California crash
value.description: Christian Vargas, 24, was charged Thursday with two murder counts, driving under the influence of alcohol causing injury within 10 years of another DUI offense and driving with a .08% blood ...

value.name: Suspected DUI driver in horrific fatal Pittsburg crash enters plea in court
value.description: Christian Vargas, 25, entered his plea in Contra Costa County Superior Court in Martinez in the deaths of Sela Mataele, 7, and Romero Castro. "He does not deserve no sympathy," Corrina Rosalez ...

value.name: Suspected DUI driver in horrific fatal Pittsburg crash makes first court appearance
value.description: Christian Vargas, who has a prior DUI ... as fast as 100 mph in a Camaro while at least two times the legal limit, police and the district attorney said.
